name: AlgoBlocks
description: As an all-in-one DeFi management platform, AlgoBlocks aims to simplify the process of interacting with multiple DeFi protocols across different blockchains. Here are the summary of product features that AlgoBlocks will offer to DeFi users: 1. All In one DeFi Dashboard, connect the wallet to view your DeFi portfolio. 2. Intelligent and personalized signals system. Simply connect your wallet for our system to guide you with your DeFi journey. 3. Curated one-click investment option or DIY your own pre-programmed trade. 4. Marketplace, visit the marketplace to find curated DeFi Investment recommendations. 5. Swap Assets, access multiple DEXes on a single page. 6. Comprehensive Dapp and DEX search engine, from DEXes to NFTs. 7. DeFi education portal with a gamified system to encourage DeFi newbies to learn DeFi concepts and earn NFTs.
